thread.title: With a Year to Go to Brexit, U.K. Economy Falls Behind

author: Jason Douglas
title: With a Year to Go to Brexit, U.K. Economy Falls Behind
text:
LONDON—The U.K. is entering its final year in the European Union set to be the slowest-growing economy among its wealthy peers, with uncertainty expected to blunt the benefits of a global upswing as the country races to hammer out the thorny details of its future.
Since voters opted for Brexit in a 2016 referendum, the country’s steady, if unspectacular, growth has been better than most forecasters predicted. But in the final quarter of 2017 the U.K. had the weakest expansion among the Group of Seven advanced economies. 
...
